description:
The glamping version of trail mix. If you are fan of the original but feel like spoiling yourself, Fuji Salted Mix is sure to satisfy.

  • Ingredients: almonds*, raisins* (raisins*, sunflower oil*), Brazil nuts*, hazelnuts*, cashews*, sunflower seeds*, pumpkin seeds*, cranberries* (cranberries*, cane sugar*, sunflower oil*), coconut oil*, sea salt. *Organic
  • Allergens: may contain: pecan, pistachio, walnut and sesame
  • Prana is Montreal based family business committed to making healthy and delicious snacks, with low impact. When possible, Prana Organics uses locally sourced organic ingredients. When they can’t find what they need nearby, Prana Organics ensure the farmers they work with use sustainable farming practices and have fair working environments
name: Prana Organic Fuji Salted Mix
